sentence: The lobby and restaurant areas as well as the rooms have been remodeled recently and everything looks fresh and up to date
it is located in a great neighborhood close to a lot of nice restaurants and excellent shopping right down the block from the Anthropologie flagship store
Service in the restaurant was good though the waitresses were very polite
The highlights were staying in a beautiful and updated Westin Hotel a delicious dinner at Dante Luigis Italian Restaurant and enjoying a maturing City of Philadelphia
Great bar to hang out after a night out and meet new people
Beautiful entrance amazing atmosphere and we loved the bar

Came here to a metingExpected typical convention hotel but was delightfully surprised Nice locationExcelent stafSpacious rooms which are well maintained without signs of wearPleasant attentive stafLovely reception area Only complaint enticing “ minibar ” high calorie selections next to tv hard to ignoreGot convention price so can not comment on value for money But I will return and recommend Large hotel with small hotel feel
The breakfast buffet on Sunday was both expansive and fresh and we were given plenty of space to operate as we please

While this was perfectly fine with me when we arrived at 9 they already had a room ready for us and also gave us some extra breakfast vouchers for that morning as well platinum benefitThe room was very nice it was spacious and well kept
Everything is in waking distance from Bars clubs and dining
We filled the bar later on that evening and were buying drinks something he had prearranged with the hotel
I was shocked that a Westin would leave the hallways full of giant balls of dirty sheets and linens by each door and dirty dishes up and down the hallways
There is a bar and lounge in the lobby so you can get a bite to eat a cocktail and take a look at some Tv
Would be 5 stars if the hotel bar restaurant was better
The bar restaurant looked to be a converted ball room
Skip the overpriced buffet breakfast and check out some of the local places and you will save a bundle and eat better

Westin hotels and staff are usually great and this is no exception Great location and stafWe had no idea of the renovations taking place so do n’t plan on eating at the restaurant or having a drink at the barWe looked at getting a drink or food but stopped at the dorLoked like a little buffet area and very small barI would have liked to know of the renovation before we arrived so we could have changed or made an informed decision on stayingThe construction is very loud and we were on the 12th floor Confirm renovation is done if staying here during the week
I went out to dinner at 645 and the piles of laundry were still heaped up and down the hallway

The club sandwich and au jus arrived cold and soggy bread and the cheesecake had been in the refrigerator so long that the crust went soft when it was supposed to be crunchy cokiethe room was falling apart handles off dressers door stops hanging off rust in bathroom etcI love Westins but this one is not worth your time or money
The restaurant could use better service15 minutes for wings and the place is empty
